column3:
“I'm going to give a full review of Jagermeister OG (yes Jager is OG) marijuana strain created in Southern Oregon. I known this strain like the back of my hand so without further ado--
*Origin: Southern Oregon (anyone who tries to take credit for this remarkable strain outside of Southern Oregon is just plain full of shit)
*Appearance: darker green and purple oblong/pinecone tight buds with purple calyxes throughout w...”

“Holy Batman, Batman!!!

Rolled a RAW Joint (Jager and Blue Dream) = Blue Jager with the cone tip and.... well.... Hol' on. You better move within' 30secs of smoking because u will get mesmerized by anything u look at. Body is pain free, glossy eyes, and makes me just want to sink sink sink”

“this jagermeister is a nice less potent relaxing strain with a distinct minty after taste... i have got to vape this. this high is not couch lock" but chill and daytime functional sending a cool sensation thru your brain.”"

“I was at Beaver Bowls, looking for an indica and Jager was the bowl of the day. It was a good deal, so I bought an eighth, out of which I eventually rolled a total of four joints. I also bought a pre-roll from High Quality Compassion of Hindu-Jager, a Hindu Kush X Jager cross that smokes a lot like ordinary Jager. 

I'm not really into the flavor game and my canna-palate is weak -- to me, weed tastes like weed -- but...”

“This was such a excellent top-notch strain! This strain I had got was straight up from Southeast of Oregon of Nectar PDX. Organic grown and bred! I am an Oregonian myself and I've tried many strain and this is by far the best strain. First of all, this strain has such a dark, dense green color. The smell was super pungent too. Only downgrade was the taste, it had that metal taste, lil alcoholic taste of Jaegermeister...”

“Just got a couple z of this. Verry uniuqe strain. The buds were beautiful, perfect round buds, with bright barney purple blotches outside and a gooey purple inside. Extremly healthy,milky trichs cover the bud and leave the vibrant colors visible even without a bright light source. The smell is a piney diesely kush smell with hints of sweetnesd, maybe black licorice. The taste starts sweet, almost licorice or grape th...”
“This is my new all time favorite. Got some 2 different times at the medical market in Phoenix. Very tasty, sticky and flat out yummy. I will be buying this one every chance I get.”

“I Call it Jager like jagermeister. I definitely see why it has that name, It has a pungent pepper and black liquorice smell.  This strain hits hard with a full and peppery smoke flavor. It is a powerful indica with a balanced mellow and relaxed high. I've been getting it at $8. Although i adore this strain i wouldn't pay more than $10 for it. Great for unwinding at the the end of the day. A bit couch-locky.”

“Its a cross between purple Hindu kush and bluedream I live in southern Oregon this strain was made is Selma originally a friend of mine knows the creator its very mold and mildew resistant it was bred outside and the buds are dense and no matter who grows it with what nutes it always tastes smells and looks the same”
“Overall, Jager is a pretty good strain for being so cheap in my area ($4 - $7 a gram).  Nothing exceptional about it to justify paying top shelf prices.”

“This strain is bomb! Super dense sticky nugs, great for rolling blunts. The smell is definitely really distinct. Super dank indica, nice and relaxing but it won't knock you out. No dry eyes at all, and only a little cottonmouth. Definite pain relieving effects, had really sore muscles when I smoked this and was able to work out later that day with no problems. Recommended for people trying to just kick back and chill...”

“Jager is a very potent indica. It's one of those strains that you really can't go anywhere because of how indica heavy it is. It had me very relaxed, chilled out, and just spacey as hell. 

I got a little bit dizzy and nauseous at a few moments during the night, but I didn't get sick and it didn't last long, so that may be something to watch for.

This strain I feel was bred for insomnia, because you knock the fuck o...”

“Visually striking purple and brown buds. The powerfully heady fragrance by itself is nearly intoxicating.  I found the taste was like freshly cut grass with some citrus and pine. After a few vapes, I pretty much got lost while sitting still. Effects lasted well over 4 hours as sobriety gently returned. Overall feeling was even-keeled, imaginative, and talkative. While playing darts, I hit the bulls eye more frequentl...”

“So happy I found some of this strain in shatter. Jaeger reminds me of 2 strains...Black Ice or F*cking Incredible.
Brand: Canamo
THC: 74%

I see it says something about Blue Dream as a possible parent but in my opinion it doesn't resemble BD at all.
If you need a good night time medication this is a good one.
Relaxation washes over you in comfortable waves from head to toe, and you will want to keep plenty of munchie...”
“LOVE the wickedly complex bouquet and the flavors are better than any bag of skittles!”

“this is the first time i've ever smoked purple weed.

i feel purple. beautifully purple.”

“The budtender said, with a dreamy look in his eye, as he took a sniff from the jar of bud, that the aroma of this strain resembled that of wafting dark roast coffee as it fills the room. That was spot on.

It's an interesting Indica in that I feel some nice energy. My body feels like a wet noodle in a good way. I could perhaps doze for an hour but then my eyes would pop open and I would be ready for (limited amounts ...”
“Very good bud. Dense popcorn-like buds that smell very reminiscent of peppercorn & black licorice”
“Amazing taste...something of a sweet licorice taste..doesn't require too many hits..can make sleepy if unproductive, But mighty good strain!”

“gorgeous good sized buds. deep green with a touch of purple. tons of opaque trichomes with about 15% tinted amber. i opened the bag, and it smelled JUST like the alcohol i love to hate. the flavor was different than the smell, a bit piney and acidic, this is the dank fer sure. i pulled three or so bong loads, and got ready to run some errands. holy tap dancing christ! this was one of the most total and complete buzze...”

“As usual with most purple strains this one is a great sleep aid. Not great for forming cognitive thought or words into sentences, leaves you a little foggy. The particular batch I procured had a smell that immediately let you know you were dealing with a force to be reckoned with, but without fear just look the beast square in the eyes and show it just who exactly the boss is!”
“Got a gram joint of Jaeger OG" from The Herbery and I gotta say
column4: this is an intense experience. Smothered my nose with the smell of diesel and licorice with some cheese as well. Tokes pretty smooth until about half way down of course
column5: OG for sure with the earthy
column8: also a little sweetness. High is a quit hitter and definitely noticeable with the slight eye laziness and euphoria. Start getting rea...”"

column3: “Very relaxing high. 10/10”

“Jaeger/Jäger aka Jaegermeister kush As an indica lover, this strain is a must. Smooth, pungent, knock out.  Great for insomnia and a great night sleep, can be a creeper but well worth it.  Earthy sweet tones of flavor.  Heavy yielder usually in the high teens or low 20's for thc content.”

“Jaeger/Jäger aka Jaegermeister kush As an indica lover, this strain is a must. Smooth, pungent, knock out.  Great for insomnia and a great night sleep, can be a creeper but well worth it.  Earthy sweet tones of flavor.  Heavy yielder usually in the high teens or low 20's for thc content.”

“This is one of my favorite strains to date. (Pinapple Express being my favorite for as base line)

Here are a few of my uses for this strain:
I can smoke this right b4 bed and I sleep great.
Lazy Sunday sunbathing ~ hanging in the backyard with my 2 labs.

An enjoyable social strain if your NOT looking to be overly chatty. 

my wife loved this strain, she said I gave a 2 thumbs up massage compared to my usual 1 thumb...”
“Absolutely love this strain! I suffer from many conditions and nothing helps me like Jager, will always love it!! Excellent pain and nausea relief!!”
“Very nice body high, this is another strain that I love”

“OK I reviewed this before and talked about how nice and colourful and dank this Jager bud is. But I've got to say that this is also some of the heaviest Indica around in terms of pure effects. This batch right here has reached that rare high (tolerance test) for me where you are instantly feeling like a teenager again who smoked too much before class. it really is like a shot of liquor, the buzz comes fast and strong...”
“SLight berry flavor, very smooth and onset is powerful and relaxing.”

“Perfect to end the day.  Calms thoughts and soothes the body.  I like to lie down and read or watch something light until I drift to sleep.  Great for anxiety, insomnia and pain.  I don't get an uplifting" feeling
column4: but people like me wouldn't want to sleep if I do!”"

column3: “My new favorite. Patient Helping Patients in Medford has it at 17%. Try the Winston(close hybrid) at 21.3% better yet.”

“This is one of my favorite strains to date. (Pinapple Express being my favorite for as base line)

Here are a few of my uses for this strain:
I can smoke this right b4 bed and I sleep great.
Lazy Sunday sunbathing ~ hanging in the backyard with my 2 labs.

An enjoyable social strain if your NOT looking to be overly chatty. 

my wife loved this strain, she said I gave a 2 thumbs up massage compared to my usual 1 thumb...”
“Very nice body high, this is another strain that I love”
“My new favorite. Patient Helping Patients in Medford has it at 17%. Try the Winston(close hybrid) at 21.3% better yet.”

“A real beauty of a strain-- big, dank, sticky, purple, indigo, blue, green and a dang rainbow inside this bud! Oh yeah! As far as the high it is pretty straight up indica from what I recall. But this strains selling points are its bud appeal and flavor which is spicy and a little licorice dabbed on.”

“I just smoked for the first time about a half an hour ago.  I feel fabulous. It is an energetic indica to me sure but in that way  that makes one smile. Definitely not the last I have seen of this. 1/2 hr. feeling good.”

“Very strong strain. Smoked a couple bowls after a long day of work. Helped the lingering headache I've had all day, relaxed my whole body. Got the best night of sleep I've had in a while! Fun to kick back and relax, watch tv, game, listen to music. But the best part was the pain relief it provided for someone who works 12 hours a day!”
“Comfortably Numb."”"

“Holy nose! This strain has a very diesel feel to it but is definitely indica dominant. Great for relaxing and hunger this strain provides less pain relief than I others but is wonderful before bed or dinner. Puts me to sleep with a decent size dab.”

“Not a personal favorite. I've tried to smoke this a many times and I've never been a fan. It's just a strain that always makes me feel groggy and crappy if I don't just keep smoking. If you're looking for a bud that will help you sleep though, this is the one for you.”

“Very strong strain. Smoked a couple bowls after a long day of work. Helped the lingering headache I've had all day, relaxed my whole body. Got the best night of sleep I've had in a while! Fun to kick back and relax, watch tv, game, listen to music. But the best part was the pain relief it provided for someone who works 12 hours a day!”
“Comfortably Numb."”"

“Pleasantly surprised at how much like licorice this strain actually taste like. Even through a dirty piece it still has a great taste. It is a more of a clear high( although its still heavy) for being an indica. Jr. is now in my top favorite strains for sure.”
“One of the best I've had in my life. Very relaxing. I mean I was bodied on the couch but I was wide awoke watching tv.”
“I dig it. Its A good taste and it's a layed back buzz LOven it”
“Jr is my go to" strain. It's like your favorite beer or dessert. Something you don't mind having a lot of. Dark
column6: you know what to expect. An inexpensive strain that doesn't disappoint.”"

column3: “Good shit cuz”
“I dig it. Its A good taste and it's a layed back buzz LOven it”

“I just smoked for the first time about a half an hour ago.  I feel fabulous. It is an energetic indica to me sure but in that way  that makes one smile. Definitely not the last I have seen of this. 1/2 hr. feeling good.”
“Good shit cuz”
“Jr is my go to" strain. It's like your favorite beer or dessert. Something you don't mind having a lot of. Dark
column6: you know what to expect. An inexpensive strain that doesn't disappoint.”"

column3: “Holy nose! This strain has a very diesel feel to it but is definitely indica dominant. Great for relaxing and hunger this strain provides less pain relief than I others but is wonderful before bed or dinner. Puts me to sleep with a decent size dab.”

“My favorite indica strain it hit best when you smoke or Cape at a lately pace for me at least and it kills pain anxiety and stress like a charm its great  when you've finished studying or just to chill strong head high that can creep its way down into the body I always try to keep some on hand”

“A real beauty of a strain-- big, dank, sticky, purple, indigo, blue, green and a dang rainbow inside this bud! Oh yeah! As far as the high it is pretty straight up indica from what I recall. But this strains selling points are its bud appeal and flavor which is spicy and a little licorice dabbed on.”

“PTSD sufferer here! For whatever reason, this strain put my amygdala on red alert.  It may have to do with the Blue Dream parentage (Blue Dream historically makes me paranoid af).  HORRIBLE dry mouth.  The body high was really intense and nice but didn't override the very, very intense anxiety and paranoia.”

“I'm born and raised in Southern Oregon and this is one of my favorites!! :D

*highly recommend*”
“Potent and pungent purple nugs fantastic strain”

“A real beauty of a strain-- big, dank, sticky, purple, indigo, blue, green and a dang rainbow inside this bud! Oh yeah! As far as the high it is pretty straight up indica from what I recall. But this strains selling points are its bud appeal and flavor which is spicy and a little licorice dabbed on.”
“Jr is my go to" strain. It's like your favorite beer or dessert. Something you don't mind having a lot of. Dark
column6: you know what to expect. An inexpensive strain that doesn't disappoint.”"

column3: “Very strong strain. Smoked a couple bowls after a long day of work. Helped the lingering headache I've had all day, relaxed my whole body. Got the best night of sleep I've had in a while! Fun to kick back and relax, watch tv, game, listen to music. But the best part was the pain relief it provided for someone who works 12 hours a day!”
“Smoked it during a panic attack. JGR will slowly and comfortably make you feel like the Marijuana God's wrapped you in a blanket of sunshine and happiness.”

“PTSD sufferer here! For whatever reason, this strain put my amygdala on red alert.  It may have to do with the Blue Dream parentage (Blue Dream historically makes me paranoid af).  HORRIBLE dry mouth.  The body high was really intense and nice but didn't override the very, very intense anxiety and paranoia.”

“Looks pretty with its dark purple coloring, and has a great relaxing effect without locking you down. I'm personally a fan of how it makes you sleepy on the tail end, since I smoke to chill and sleep. Gotta respect this strain tho, take a little too much and it can have some nasty physical effects (REALLY jacked up heart rate, happened to multiple friends after some heavy hits, lead to some anxiety). Lighter sessions...”

“A real beauty of a strain-- big, dank, sticky, purple, indigo, blue, green and a dang rainbow inside this bud! Oh yeah! As far as the high it is pretty straight up indica from what I recall. But this strains selling points are its bud appeal and flavor which is spicy and a little licorice dabbed on.”

“Very strong strain. Smoked a couple bowls after a long day of work. Helped the lingering headache I've had all day, relaxed my whole body. Got the best night of sleep I've had in a while! Fun to kick back and relax, watch tv, game, listen to music. But the best part was the pain relief it provided for someone who works 12 hours a day!”
“Comfortably Numb."”"

“AMAZING strain. I’ve tried about 40-45 different strains, and this is number 3 in my list of favorites. Such a euphoric high. It really helped with my depression and made me feel very sensitive to sensory stimulation—music was INCREDIBLE while smoking Jaeger. I remember smoking it before going to the club, and it was such a fun night. There isn’t a feeling of sedation with this strain. I had two strains at the time, ...”
“I dig it. Its A good taste and it's a layed back buzz LOven it”

“JGR is a very good indica for sex. It’s trippy, relaxing, and doesn’t numb things out. The only issue with it is that it’s super strong and might be too heavy for consistent nighttime use (if your goal is sex). And if you have it during the day, it’s hard to come back from it to do anything productive afterward. I hate criticizing a great heavy-hitter like this. But we rate based on how strains work for sex, and this...”
“Normally I smoke indoor but I have a batch of outdoor JR grown in southern Oregon. Amazing purple frosted buds. Very relaxing, sleepy and melts my anxiety away. Has a grape earthy taste..love it”
“Good shit cuz”

“A real beauty of a strain-- big, dank, sticky, purple, indigo, blue, green and a dang rainbow inside this bud! Oh yeah! As far as the high it is pretty straight up indica from what I recall. But this strains selling points are its bud appeal and flavor which is spicy and a little licorice dabbed on.”
“Comfortably Numb."”"

“JGR is a very good indica for sex. It’s trippy, relaxing, and doesn’t numb things out. The only issue with it is that it’s super strong and might be too heavy for consistent nighttime use (if your goal is sex). And if you have it during the day, it’s hard to come back from it to do anything productive afterward. I hate criticizing a great heavy-hitter like this. But we rate based on how strains work for sex, and this...”
“Good shit cuz”
“I dig it. Its A good taste and it's a layed back buzz LOven it”

“Very strong strain. Smoked a couple bowls after a long day of work. Helped the lingering headache I've had all day, relaxed my whole body. Got the best night of sleep I've had in a while! Fun to kick back and relax, watch tv, game, listen to music. But the best part was the pain relief it provided for someone who works 12 hours a day!”

“Not a ton of available info on this unique strain, but...

Overall this is a great Indica dominant. The high is energetic and fresh, you’ll feel a nice body high. The body high isn’t overpowering, just very relaxing. After a few rips, you will feel the buzz creeping in through the back of your eyes, onto your neck, shoulders and back. What follows is a great head buzz. you’ll feel very relaxed while also being energe...”
“Great for nighttime use. Will induce sleep, ease tension and sooth spasming muscles. Hunger inducing.”
“makes me tired as hell.. but still good”
“a great strain for both recreational and medical use. moves itself honestly. positive reviews from everyone who smoked it with me. definitely an obscure must-have strain”
“Great looking weed, nice purple accents. Taste is amazing, something I couldn’t explain. Smells like straight GAS!”

“it's so much better than waking up not remembering what happened the night before. And there's even a hint of licorice in the smoke. The purple leaves within the bud doesnt mean it has a grape flavor at all. Definitely taste trac3s of back to like Northern Lights ancestry in this strain. Blow the smoke and it doesnt linger too long either except in taste. Nice body high with a little cottonmouth & munchies. Good nigh...”

“Just bought some weed
I feel really relaxed, Also I feal it in my head, I have deep toughts. your whole body feals warm”
“By far my favorite strain. Very relaxed and functional. Erases depression and anxiety. Highly recommend.”
“I truly believe Hindu Kush is missing from parental list here but... Super amazing strain in my top5 all time hands down! For sure a daily smoker kind of flower.”

“Jgr or Jager is some of the best bud in the world 🌎 it’s won terpenes awards and all that. I’ve smoked it as my main flower for four years now as my old friend kept me in stock. It isn’t just from southern Oregon it’s from Josephine county and it’s a good strain for insomnia and stress as it’s Indica dominance keeps paranoia down to nil for me and curbs my nausea and pain big time! If you get a chance to try this am...”

“Great strain with a very earthy taste in my opinion. Loved the bud, got it from my favorite shop in eastern Oregon rolled into a 1g pre roll. I’ve mostly been smoking concentrates lately so the smoke was a little irritating on the lungs. Ended up splitting it into two smoke sessions.”
“Very heavy high that is perfect for sleep or relaxing after a workout. Very aromatic with tastes of potent fruit.”

“Got 10 to 13 grams of this Jager and I must say the flavor is spot on. If you are having sleeping problems, I would highly suggest this strain. I would preferably have this when I'm not doing anything tho because of the drowsiness.”
“Smoked 3 swishers and 1 dutchie of jeagermyster and i’m feeling goooood, way too gone. idk how everhbjtnt works Z the office is good”
“bred and popularized in southern Oregon....By Millerville Farms”
“My absolute favorite strain. The purple in this bud is gorgeous and the high is phenomenal!!”
“Favorite strain”
“tastes very earthy and green.”
“tastes very earthy and green.”
“great strain.  high asf after four hits.  I've been smoking everyday for 9 years.”

“I copped this strain from my little bro. Better than most strains I’ve purchased from the dispensary. Dark green buds with little purple highlights. I feel in that during most of my weed adventures this is a tell-tale sign that this is about to be some fire weed. One half gram blunt had me feeling nice.”
“I feeel Good As Shit Waves Bro Waves Lol”
“good night time smoke very sleepy weed”

“I know the gentleman that developed the strain in southern oregon and can confirm that. absolutely insane strain. very popular. very very potent and heady, the smell is almost overwhelming how much it's smells like jr.”
“MY FAVORITE STRAIN🙌🏽💯”
“this is some of the best I've ever smoked and that's saying a lot in 23 years of smoking.”
“Fantastic Sativa! Comes highly recommend! Biased because my nickname is J.R.”

“this is a super indica for a sativa guy like me. it has a mild high with great pain relief (migraines)  and none of that pot hangover the next day. it is functional so you can sleep if you wish but it isn't demanded. good flavor and appearance.”
“this strain is very helpful with back pain. it's very relaxing, so be prepared to get sleepy. it has a very medicinal and black licorice taste. 💚💜”
“This strain is a knock out for me gets rid of my pain in my back and leaves me with a nice head high and tingles in my body, great for my heavy smoking during the day for my pain.”

“So, I've been enjoying trying different strains, seeing what works for me as far as relaxation, pain relief, etc.

By itself, JR doesn't do much for me. The taste and smell? Oh god no. No. Too strong (not in a good way) like a dead skunk. Hurts my throat too. 

However, I mixed it with some Blueberry Widow that I had, and WOW! Great head high that faded to a body high, pretty good couch lock, almost zero dry mouth (b...”

“In my opinion Jager for me was a very pleasant smoke. 

Pretty pungent smelling. Could definitely pick up on the black licorice scent. Nice dense, dark green colored buds with purple/red hairs. Buds hold a long lasting burn, with a smooth hit. The taste was dank pleasurable. 

Relaxing, strong cerebral buzz followed with an almost stupid stone. This strain will definitely make you zone out and leave you forgetful. Me...”
“Did it as shatter... very nice but definitely a couch- lock" feel. After reading reviews I am going to look for flower. Smooth and sedating very nice.”"
“Love this stain can't find it in az anymore if anyone knows where to find it please HELP.”

“One of my very favorite strains. Looks weird, very dark, hard little buds. But grind it up, and the smell is delicious. Taste is fantastic; earthy, floral, fruity, vanilla, almost perfume. The effect is incredibly well balanced; this strain is good anytime of day when looking to relieve anxiety, pain, stress. No side effects at all. This is excellent medicine that I'll buy at every opportunity!”
“Its a great strain , really dense stinky sticky buds.  Love the smell and look of this weed.  Would defiantly suggest this to so!eone that has pain or anxiety .”
“the licorice smell describes it perfectly”
“good price but Lil harsh smoke . ok hints of flavor but again lil harsh”
“yummy”
“already recommended this strain at this location and one that I woukd get again very relaxing and peaceful feeling :)”

“Always a good fine, Jager is a stong indica, great for that bowl before bed or lazy saturdays around the house. a sweet piney taste, but some do find it a bit harsh, so id recommend a good bong or bubbler for smoking”
“Good shit, good hits, hits good”
“Sick purple nugs. Trichomes on point. Distinct black licorice smell and taste. Awesome indica for any time of the day.”
“This strain really makes you feel like you’re sinking into your bed/couch or wherever u are. If you’ve ever smoked blue dream, Jaeger has the same mesmerizing effects. Also you get very giggly.”
“Good pungent high. Mild flavor.”

“This stuff is a treat, a little bit has me ripped where as a lot of other strains it takes more. I'd say it's predominantly indica chill feeling, not too sedating. The sativa aspects are definitely there too but just a bit. The smell is like a licorice/diesel combined which is somewhat strange yet intriguing.”

“I ordered some Jager based on an online description. Soon after l turned to Leafly to see what was bought. I was going for an indica but became scared with descriptions that made it seem like Good @ Plenty and even worse Blue Dream was in the lineage
(I hate BD, it's too damn harsh).

It arrived and was a pungent delightful smoke. Not the strongest bud,  but delicious. I grew up in the 70's and you had one choice bac...”
“tastes very earthy and green.”

“Got 10 to 13 grams of this Jager and I must say the flavor is spot on. If you are having sleeping problems, I would highly suggest this strain. I would preferably have this when I'm not doing anything tho because of the drowsiness.”

“it's so much better than waking up not remembering what happened the night before. And there's even a hint of licorice in the smoke. The purple leaves within the bud doesnt mean it has a grape flavor at all. Definitely taste trac3s of back to like Northern Lights ancestry in this strain. Blow the smoke and it doesnt linger too long either except in taste. Nice body high with a little cottonmouth & munchies. Good nigh...”

“Sleep it helps with sleep. Long restful night of sleep. Its been a long time since I have slept 7 hours without waking up. This strain had very tight buds. Helped with eating also. Helped my headaches, joints, muscles also,”
“Great all around smoke”
“To end any confusion, Jaeger is a Purple Hindu Kush backcrossed with itself to create this unique Southern Oregon phenotype.  Sweet and high terpine with purple hues.”
“one of my favorites!! very nice head n body feelin”
“good night time smoke very sleepy weed”
“Very heavy high that is perfect for sleep or relaxing after a workout. Very aromatic with tastes of potent fruit.”
“I truly believe Hindu Kush is missing from parental list here but... Super amazing strain in my top5 all time hands down! For sure a daily smoker kind of flower.”
“Great looking weed, nice purple accents. Taste is amazing, something I couldn’t explain. Smells like straight GAS!”
“a great strain for both recreational and medical use. moves itself honestly. positive reviews from everyone who smoked it with me. definitely an obscure must-have strain”

“Just started smoking again. 

This is a good indica that’s not to heavy. The high is super relaxing and mellow, it doesn’t make me feel super “stoned” or couch locked. I like it a lot.”

“#1 Indica Award goes to Jäger hands down. Perfect Night time strain. It’s flavor & smell is fruity af, definitely one to remember! As it is very unique. The high will have you in deep relaxation. recommend for a long day after work. My coworkers wouldn’t even dare smoke it again during lunch break because it would have them slumped but it’s too bomb to pass up on ya heard 🤤”

“I know there's some question as to Jager's lineage.  The bag I got looked, smelled, tasted, and hit very much like straight Hindu Kush.  The buds likely won't win any beauty contests. They are a dark brown-green with ample orange hairs.  Smell is earthy; taste is unspectacular.  I agree in general with the statement, body effects are better described as relaxing than sedating."  It doesn't bring the couch lock
“The buzz is amazing. So relaxed right now.”

“Jeger or JGR is an indica hybrid reported to be Blue Dream x LA confidential. However, I question that as niether of those two strains individual quirks such as the blue hue or LA confidential cylax we're seen. This strain has a very long flower time at 16 weeks, it is mold mildew resistant, temperature resistant, even root rot resistamt. This strain did well indoors however it was clearly outdoors from the sample it...”
“If you love indica...rhis is the strain for you...10”
“Very relaxing! Superior head high, comfortable but pretty heavy body high, and its own particular taste.”

“I rate pretty harshly but this strain did me justice.

With this strain the smell is pleasant. Was really simply to grind down. The smoke was harsh (most likely due to my return to smoking after a mini haitus & the smoking being donw outside in the cold).

You get very waved. You can feel the high THC content. If you into ASMR **** and you watch it after smoking this... nighty night.

You feel very euphoric - comoare...”

“Found a good deal at a dispensary and purchased an ounce. Firstly, the smell is incredible. The licorice/diesel smell is heavenly, and I haven't smelled a strain like this before. I have smoked and vaporized this strain and vastly prefer vaporizing. When smoking through a water pipe, I can't help but cough no matter how little I inhale.

It feels more like a creative sativa. I do feel a bit of the blue dream effects....”

“I recently tried this for tendonitis pain and had very good results.  The pain was considerably diminished, and although I felt relaxed, this strain didn't make me feel tired or sleepy.  It will probably be a favorite of mine for relief from pain and inflammation.”
“I feeel Good As Shit Waves Bro Waves Lol”

“I copped this strain from my little bro. Better than most strains I’ve purchased from the dispensary. Dark green buds with little purple highlights. I feel in that during most of my weed adventures this is a tell-tale sign that this is about to be some fire weed. One half gram blunt had me feeling nice.”
“Favorite strain”
“My absolute favorite strain. The purple in this bud is gorgeous and the high is phenomenal!!”

“I'm not sure if it's all strains of Jagermeister or just the one I got, but mine crackled when lit, was stronger than it should have been (I only took one small hit from a pipe) and it made me feel itchy, uncomfortable, and paranoid within a few seconds of smoking it.
